name: PLS â€“ Private Label Store Manager (Woo + Elementor)
author: Z2HB team

sections.description: Private label store manager for WooCommerce + Elementor.
sections.installation: Upload the plugin ZIP via Plugins > Add New and activate.
sections.changelog:
#### 0.6.1

* Moves spotlighted key ingredients into their own panel and removes the unused icon tips.
* Adds inline attribute search so existing options are easier to reuse while editing products.
* Refreshes version metadata for the next release.

#### 0.6.0

* Fixes media pickers by enqueueing WordPress media scripts and improves textarea styling for product storytelling.
* Enables instant ingredient creation with short descriptions, refreshed selection lists, and richer key-ingredient previews with fallbacks.
* Makes label application optional, formats attribute prices, and auto-loads attribute values for faster configuration.

#### 0.5.21

* Refreshes the product wizard with separate panels for descriptions, directions, skin types, and benefits plus softer styling.
* Rebuilds attribute selection to toggle between existing options or new entries with price impacts tied to chosen values.
* Streamlines label customization with design callouts, enforced label-guide defaults, and clearer upload expectations.

#### 0.4.3

* Hardens the PLS product screen to prevent critical errors and simplifies attribute creation to label-only.
* Keeps WooCommerce untouched while the modal editor handles packs, media, ingredients, and label options.

#### 0.4.1

* Conflict-free branch with updated release metadata for packaging.

#### 0.4.0

* Modern modal-first product builder with instant packs, media, and label options.
* Ingredients and categories can be created directly inside PLS without Woo sync.
